attributes.title: Projected Temperature Change -- U.S. (Puget Sound)
attributes.citation: Abatzoglou, J. T., Brown, T. J. 2012. A comparison of statistical downscaling methods suited for wildfire applications. International Journal of Climatology, 32(5), 772-780. doi: http://dx.doi.org/10.1002/joc.2312
attributes.description: These indicators are derived from the Multivariate Adaptive Constructed Analogs (MACA) CMIP5 Future Climate Dataset. For more information about this analysis, please see http://cses.washington.edu/picea/mauger/ps-sok/ps-sok_sec12_builtenvironment_2015.pdf. For more information about the MACA CMIP5 Future Climate Dataset please see http://maca.northwestknowledge.net/index.php
attributes.short-description: Projected increase in temperature in the Puget Sound Lowlands relative to average temperature between 1950-2005.
attributes.subtitle: MACAv2-LIVNEH CMIP5 Temperature
